response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just any item; it's an investment in efficiency and quality that truly stands out in its field. Given your discerning taste and the value you place on excellence, I believe this product would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500, which I think strikes a great balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. This is an exclusive opportunity, so don't hesitate to make your decision soon.", "product_price": 9500}
